description:
These two friends try to find a bathroom in the huge
industrial building, unaware that someone else is
roaming the halls looking to take advantage of a
situation just like this one.
What happens when friends are bound and made to
pleasure each other for their tormentor's amusement?
How do friends react when made to lick each other's
pussy until orgasm? How do they move on with their
normal lives once it is over and they are free?
Welcome Alexa Jordan and Sara Faye to this special
Hogtied fantasy role play update.
title: Two friends find out it is not safe to roam the halls
